description: Log2Console is a development tool offering a nice UI to display, filter and search log messages from different logging services: Log4Net, Log4j and NLog. It can directly receive log events locally or remotely, or read them from a log file... It is written with C#.
summary: Log2Console - A Generic Log Viewer for Log4Net, NLog etc
author: Statyk7 calhuskerfan DarrelMiller leetbmc LexLavnikov michalsteyn Rudy_Wahl vertigo00oo Yakoo
